title: Āchārya-charaṇa-vandana
author: Composed by Śrīpād Bhakti Ānanda Sāgar Mahārāj

translation: Glory to the lotus feet of our Śrī Gurudeva,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Śrī Bhakti Sundara Deva-Goswāmī Govinda
Wishing Grace Divine upon the whole of the creation,<br class="SongVerse__break" />From Goloka came thee down, most Gracious Incarnation.
Hundred-petalled lotus flower—Lotus Face ablooming,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Young and old behold thee, all their hearts’ joy overflowing.
Both home and abroad Lord’s Hallowed Name thou art apreaching,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Flood of Love for Gaura entire planet inundating.
Benedictine fountain from thy pen in hand awriting,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Sweetest songs of Love Divine a flow is never ending.
Agent of the Waves of Perfect Truth—fathomless ocean,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Serve Śrī Guru and Vaiṣṇava! thy heart’s dedication.
Truthful heart adored by saints—thy natural compassion,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Always humble, giving honour, in sweet conversation.
Guru Mahārāj of Nyāsī Kings the Great Grandfather,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Śrī-Bhakti-Rakṣaka Deva-Goswāmī Śrīdhara
Satisfied supremely with thy Service dedicated,<br class="SongVerse__break" />By his own hand did he place thee on his chair exalted.

text: ehena apūrva sneha kothāo nā heri
translation: Joyfully as his successor he hath thee achosen,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Such benign affection ne’er we find in all creation.

text: tava hṛde vahe sadā bhuvana pāvanī
translation: Rūpa-Saraswatī-Śrīdhar River flowing freely,<br class="SongVerse__break" />From thy heart throughout the world makes everything so holy.
Supreme God of Good our Guide, compassion’s Divine Treasure,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Ever plays within thy heart as Nityānanda’s Pleasure.
Faithfully the true devotees sing thy Supreme Glories,<br class="SongVerse__break" />Lost, deluded souls dishonour thee, alas! and perish.
By thy Grace shall we now serve our Lord and Golden Master,<br class="SongVerse__break" />This fallen soul exults in thy Sweet Chanting Dance forever
